author: Staff Reporter
text:
Lead Bank has commenced the preparation of list of micro observers required for the Assembly elections from among the bank and insurance sector officials and Central Government employees.

Official sources told The Hindu that it was planned to deploy a total of 405 micro observers for the eight Assembly constituencies in the district.

The Lead Bank would be preparing a list of around 460 persons to keep a buffer in the case of last minute changes needed.

Directions

Meanwhile, the district administration had requested the banks in the district to include the Aadhaar number in the bank account of Central Government pensioners to help them enable the ‘Digital Life Certificate’ at anytime from anywhere.

The said certificate was to be filed periodically by the pensioners to keep the authorities informed of their life presence for drawing the pension.
title: Bank begins preparation of micro observers’ list
